az: introduced with innocence who would have ever guessed that u were the one i had been so desperately searching 4 u talk as i do but yet u dont understand when i mumble u c as i do but your vision is blurred by naivete this is the barrier that separates us i cannot cross yet there is 2 much of me that would frighten u so i live in heartache because we cannot fully explore this love and what of your heartache does it feel as sharp as mine no matter where i go or how long it takes i will never recover from this mutual heartache.
